title: I'm seeing a lot of theis typeface - what is it?

comments.content: Hehehe, bested by Mr. Farrelly. Good one, Robbie

Here’s a link – [Typ1451](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051242/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Typ1451/). I used this typeface in my final year degree project. It sets beautifully and is really nice to read!
Bald you must be slowing up!
A very speedy response as usual! thanks!
